annotations:
ATT- Chartering Desk
FM- SR Ship – SGP
Good day, Please propose for our below vessels :
01) MV  Aisha Sarwar (DWT: 48,265 SSW: 11.735 M, Built: 2000, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4 X 25M SWL, LOA: 189.33 M)
Opening Chattogram, Bangladesh 28th August, 2024, Further details as per attached TC description.
02) MV. Fatema Jahan I (DWT: 66,604, SSW: 12.925 M, Built: 2015, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4X31 MT SWL, LOA: 199.99 M
Opening CJK, China 29th August, 2024, Further details as per attached TC description
03) MV. Abdullah (DWT: 58,068 SSW: 12.826, Blt: 2015, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4X30M SWL, LOA: 189.93 M),
Opening Kandla, India 1st September 2024, Further details as per attached ship's particular
04) MV. Zayd Jahan (DWT: 66,637 SSW: 12.925 M, Blt: 2015, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4X31MT SWL, LOA: 199.99 M),
Opening Payra, Bangladesh 05th September, 2024, Further details as per attached ship's particulars
05)MV. Jahan Brothers II (DWT: 56,014, SSW: 12.573 M, Built: 2008, HOLD: 5H/5H, GRD: 4X30 MT SWL, LOA: 189.99 M),
Opening Yantai, China 05th September 2024, Further details as per attached TC description
Best Regards.
Capt Shahid
SR SHIP (S) PTE LTD
10,Anson Road
#41-11,International Plaza
Singapore 079903
Tel : +65-62255540/62255167
Email :

As agents only
Disclaimer:
The information contained in this email (including any attachments) is confidential ,is given in good faith, without prejudice, without any guarantee  and in the course of business of S.R Ship (S) Pte Ltd
( including but not limited to sale and purchase offers and inquiries, cargo and period orders,operations & Chartering activities , vessels’ positions & circulations etc.) only. In accordance with EU General Data
Protection Regulation (GDPR)(https://www.eugdpr.org/),& Singapore Data Protection Act 2012 Please notify us if you do NOT wish to receive any message from us. If you want to exercise your
right -to be forgotten- you may request from us to delete your personal data from our records at any given time.
Confidentiality Note: This e-mail may contain private, confidential or legally privileged information.Any unauthorized use, discussion, distribution, or copying of the information contained herein, is strictly prohibited.
If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify us by telephone, fax or e-mail and delete this message, without reviewing the contents hereof.
